Prolific Integration
====================

Overview
--------

To use ChatLab through Prolific:

1. Create a Prolific study.
2. Set the study URL to your Qualtrics or REDCap survey that contains ChatLab.
3. Include the Prolific participant ID in your survey URL:

   ``?PROLIFIC_PID={{%PROLIFIC_PID%}}``

Tracking
--------

- ChatLab automatically logs Prolific IDs through the embedded survey.
- Completion codes can be displayed after the conversation ends.
